title: Worst Case Scenario - Book 4: The State
description: As the deadline approaches for states to switch their allegiance from the USA to the new Chinese controlled PNA, Ian and Bob construct the framework for a new militia. But, there is a greater danger to the two families than the deadline. The enemy is closer than they think, and the enemy is watching. The Burrows and the Tillers thought that they had eliminated the enemy at the battle for the pipeline terminalâ€¦but they were wrong.
author: G. Allen Mercer
